Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel common missense mutation G301C in the N - acetylgalactosamine - 6 - sulfate sulfatase gene in mucopolysaccharidosis IVA .

Let's think step by step.

1. Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA: This is a specific type of lysosomal storage disease. It is caused by a deficiency of the enzyme N-acetylgalactosamine-6-sulfatase, leading to the accumulation of glycosaminoglycans in various tissues and organs. Therefore, Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA is the disease entity in this paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
